name: 去超链接下划线
鼠标悬停链接指针变化
解除CSS对于选中网页元素的限制

sections.code:
span.user-name, /*百度网盘分享页*/
    .user-name.default-text, /*百度企业网盘*/
    .user-info,
    li.userbar_user>a:first-child>span,
    span.name.top-username,
    #displayUsername,
    span.u_username_title,
    span.userinfo_username,
    p.aside_user_name,
    #user,
    #pUserInfo>span:first-child,
    p.personal-url,
    div.header-tool.header-tool-user,
    #userNameCon,
    #user-name,
    #user_name,
    .username,
    #username,
    /*.user-name,*/ /*导致百度知道回答者ID消失*/
    #username_info,
    #anchor-user-name,
    div.user_name.text_overflow,
    a.top-uname,
    a.mn-lk,
    i.cmn-ellipsis,
    li[data-key='PERSONAL'] {
        display: none !important;
    }

name: Hide Baidu ID
code:
@-moz-document domain("baidu.com") {
span.user-name, /*百度网盘分享页*/
    .user-name.default-text, /*百度企业网盘*/
    .user-info,
    li.userbar_user>a:first-child>span,
    span.name.top-username,
    #displayUsername,
    span.u_username_title,
    span.userinfo_username,
    p.aside_user_name,
    #user,
    #pUserInfo>span:first-child,
    p.personal-url,
    div.header-tool.header-tool-user,
    #userNameCon,
    #user-name,
    #user_name,
    .username,
    #username,
    /*.user-name,*/ /*导致百度知道回答者ID消失*/
    #username_info,
    #anchor-user-name,
    div.user_name.text_overflow,
    a.top-uname,
    a.mn-lk,
    i.cmn-ellipsis,
    li[data-key='PERSONAL'] {
        display: none !important;
    }
}

name: Youtube Beautifier
Clean Douyu
code:
@-moz-document domain("douyu.com") {
    [class^="broadcastDiv-"],
    [id$="douyu_room_normal_player_danmuDom"],
    #js-player-dialog,
    .SuperFansGuideTips,
    .footer,
    .see-super-definition-videos,
    .gift-bg,
    .get-gift-box,
    .summer_gift_detail,
    #js-room-activity,
    .summer_gift_detail,
    .pop-zoom-wrap,
    .layout-Player-effect,
    .ZoomTip, .pop-zoom-container,
    .recommendApp-0e23eb,
    .FansMedal,
    .UserLevel,
    .Motor,
    .Barrage-icon,
    .Barrage-noble,
    .Download-iconAdd,
    *[class^='Header-menu-icon'],
    .Title-roomOtherBottom,
    #js-player-toolbar,
    #guess-main-panel,
    .FansMedalPanel-container,
    .headerdown-corner,
    .WeekRank,
    .layout-Player-rank,
    .layout-Player-rankAll,
    .Title-AnchorLevel,
    #js-stats-and-actions,
    #js-fans-rank,
    .recommand-ad,
    .column.rec,
    [class*='danmu'],
    p[class^='txt-'] {
        display: none !important;
    }
    /*
    #js-live-room-normal-right {
		display: none !important;
    }
    */
    .layout-Player-asideMainTop {
		margin-top: -220px !important;
    }
}
